params.description: params defines the parameters of the module.

QueryParamsResponse.title: Query Params Response
QueryParamsResponse.description: QueryParamsResponse is the response type for the Query/Params RPC method.

cosmos.base.v1beta1.Coin.title: Coin
cosmos.base.v1beta1.Coin.description: Coin defines a token with a denomination and an amount. NOTE: The amount field is an Int which implements the custom method signatures required by gogoproto.

flow_funds_commission.description: Commision rate percentage for returning remaining funds in flow fee account after final execution, e.g. 100 = 1X, 250 = 250

flow_flex_fee_mul.description: Multiplier to the flexible flow gas fee in promille, e.g. 1000 = 1X, 2500 = 2,5x

burn_fee_per_msg.description: Fixed burn fee per message execution to burn native denom

gas_fee_coins.description: Array of denoms that can be used for fee payment together with an amount

relayer_rewards.description: relayer rewards in uinto for each message type 0=SDK,1=Wasm, 2=Osmo. Rewards are in uinto and topped up in the module account by alloc module.

intento.intent.v1.Params.title: Params
intento.intent.v1.Params.description: Params defines the params for activeness of Flows on governance proposals.
